name: Latinos In Social Media
about: Latinos In Tech Innovation and Social Media (LATISM), a 501(c) 4 nonprofit, nonpartisan organization dedicated to advancing the social, civic and economic status of the Latino community. Founded by @AnaRC

data.message: We have taken over the Waldorf Astoria! #Latism13 #latism
#LATISM13 Gran Gatsby Gala has begun! Thank you Javi Gatsby #toyota #toyotalatino @javi_nyc #latism http://bit.ly/17Q4Xz8
Wish you were all here. #latism13 El Gran Gatsby Gala! #latism
Via Sharon Pandolfo Perez - Check out DJ Moe Vega!
Guess what day it is!! ... See you all at the Bienvenida Party tonight to kick off #latism13

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR ALL #LATISM13 TENNIS TOURNAMENT PARTICIPANTS: 

In order to travel as group to the Billie Jean Tennis Center tomorrow, all participants - tennis players, bloggers and general public - need to be at the lobby at 10:30am. Don't forget your racquet, tennis equipment, smartphone to tweet, extra batteries, chargers/cables and some cash since we are taking a $6 round-trip at Grand Station to Flushing Meadows. 

We look forward to seeing you all tomorrow morning for our 1st fun, social #LATISMsports initiative. 

Larry Pedrosa & Ernesto Sosa 
Tennis Tournament Directors
LIKE or RT this post if you are joining us for #Latism13 tomorrow!! #latism #wecantwait

Create your own Gang of 7 to fight for comprehensive immigration reform! http://www.all4immigration.us/
Join us for #All4Immigration March in NYC this Saturday, Sept. 21 at LATISM13 Register for the conference >> http://conference.latism.org/register

THREE more days!!! Are you joining us for First Ever Latino Hackatón; All4Immigration March; and El Gran Gatsby Gala? All this and more at the historical Waldorf Astoria New York! Http://conference.latism.org/register
Our founder Ana Roca Castro on #AlPinto this morning with @JorgeRamosNews this morning. #univision #latism #latism13 #all4immigration http://bit.ly/18kk4xr
If you missed #LATISM founder @AnaRc on @Univision @AlPunto with @JorgeRamosNews earlier today, here it is #All4Immigration http://video.univision.mobi/entry/view/id/2116379
Join us for a Night of #LATISM on #RadioCapicu at 8pm est. We'll be talking about #LATISM13. Call in and participate. http://bit.ly/1aLDO4O
TONIGHT! We are talking all things LATISM'13 in NYC on The Capicu Radio Show. 8PM/EST Join us! https://www.facebook.com/events/172359769615455/

data.description:
Are you a Latin@ Tennis Player? Join us for the #LATISM13 Inaugural Mixed Round Robin Tennis Tournament at the US Open facility on September 19th. All tennis player levels, male and female are welcome to participate and best of all it's a free event sponsored by the USTA. It's time to "Meet-up, Tweet-up, serve them UP, and have some fun!" 

Hurry up and register here now: http://ow.ly/nIIxc 

Got questions? Contact our Tennis Tournament Directors Larry Pedrosa (lpedrosa@sowebinc.com / @MiamiLawrence) and Ernesto Sosa (esosa@sowebinc.com / @ernestososa).
data.location: Flushing Meadows Corona Park, Corona, New York
data.name: #LATISM13 Tennis Tournament

data.description:
Order tickets via Eventbrite:
http://latism13-efbevent.eventbrite.com

Founded in 2009, Latinos in Tech Innovation & Social Media (LATISM) is a 501(c)4 nonprofit, nonpartisan organization dedicated to advancing the social, civic and economic status of the Latino community.


LATISM actively engages in digital communities to ensure that online discourse more accurately reflects the rich diversity of thought, heritage and culture in our changing society.

Our Mission:
At the heart of Latinos in Tech Innovation & Social Media (LATISM) is a commitment to integral action for and by Latinos. We believe in community action and our mission is the manifestation of that commitment.  Our mission is to empower our community in the areas of education, technology, health and business through tech innovation and social media.
LATISM seeks to equip our members with the tools they need to transform their communities by integrating community and networking resources that enable our members to make choices, take part in actions and decisions that affect their lives, and become agents for change.
 
LATISM13:
Our annual conference is the point of encounter.  It has become an epicenter for top experts and thought leaders in the health, technology, education and business industries to share best practices in the use of tech innovation and social media in the Hispanic community.  Our conference attracts the top Latino(a) bloggers, tech entrepreneurs and social media influencers of the country.   They all have a sense of mission and focus on using their influence for causes that are close to their hearts.  Additionally, all our LATISM Chapter Directors come together for capacity building, strategic planning and to strengthen our core mission in order to be true stewards in theirs respective cities.
 
Regardless of the large numbers, our conference feels like a big family where hugs are the new black.  Join us and you will see what we mean.  Hasta pronto!
data.name: #LATISM13 Conference - New York City

data.name: A Night of #LATISM w/ Radio Capicu

data.description:
It can be a challenge to get sentiment across via social media platforms but we think this statement does it: 

"I would like to invite every American who is as angry as I am to join me at Latism’13 where we will have the first Immigration Reform March." @AnaRC , Founder #LATISM 

Gente, we are serious and passionate about immigration reform. We know you are, too! So much that despite being almost sold out for #LATISM13, we will create more space for those who now want to be a part of the conference AND the Immigration Reform March. (We will announce how to get those tickets at the Twitter Chat.) 

JOIN US for this SPECIAL #LATISM and #ALL4Immigration Twitter Chat! Let's keep the conversation leading to the Immigration Reform March at #LATISM13 in NYC on Sept. 21st.  

Let’s build consensus from the bottom up. Help your freaked out neighbors understand the benefits of passing this bill.  Ready? It's time!!   

Twitter Chat: MONDAY, SEPT. 9TH 9PM EST.  
Hosts: @LATISM @AnaRC

If you are ready to commit to helping as a leader, sign up here: http://buff.ly/18GyhXA
data.name: SPECIAL #LATISM and #ALL4Immigration Twitter Chat
